title._content: [Captain Augustus C. Thompson of Co. G, 16th Georgia Infantry Regiment with sword]  (LOC)

description._content: [Captain Augustus C. Thompson of Co. G, 16th Georgia Infantry Regiment with sword] [between 1861 and 1863] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 12.6 x 10.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-22. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photo shows soldier believed to be identified as Augustus C. Thompson. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Purchased from: B.G. "Chip" Newman, Broker of Fine Antiquities, Madison, Mississippi, 2012. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Thompson, Augustus C.,--approximately 1840- Confederate States of America.--Army.--Georgia Infantry Regiment, 16th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34367 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3024
